        Parameters:
        ip - FTP server Ip
        port - FTP server port
        user - FTP user Id
        pwd - FTP user password
        commandListener - true : commandListener mode (write every ftp command on console)

      • getSubFileInfo

        public long[] getSubFileInfo(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FileInfo> fileInfoMap,
                             java.lang.String path,
                             long[] sizeAndNumFiles)
        get sub-files information under the path. It contains all files in the sub-folders under the path.
        Specified by:
        getSubFileInfo in interface Agent
        Parameters:
        fileInfoMap - input is empty map. during the method, scanned file will be added. key will be path + filename
        path - target folder path
        sizeAndNumFiles - for getting the size and file counts of getSubFolderInfo() long[0] : file size, long[1] : fileCount.
        Returns:
